SELECT ORD_TABLE_NUM, nvl(sum(ol_count*food_price),0) AS ORD_SUM_PRICE FROM (SELECT o.ORD_NO, o.ORD_TABLE_NUM, ol.OL_COUNT ,f.FOOD_PRICE FROM orders o left outer JOIN ORDER_LIST ol ON(o.ORD_NO = ol.ORD_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN food f ON(f.FOOD_NO = ol.FOOD_NO) WHERE o.PAY_NO IS NULL) GROUP BY ORD_TABLE_NUM ORDER BY ORD_TABLE_NUM asc
